g.text: Starts the process of add a park to a pharmacy
Shows to the Administrator a list of pharmacies and asks him to choose the
one he wants to add a park to
Asks for the necessary park´s data (i.e. type of park (scooter/drone), spots
capacity, power capacity) and also asks to select the spots that will
Displays the data, asking him to confirm it

a.text: one to the number inserted for spotsCapacity

g.text: Informs about the success of the operation
